name: RetrieveWebhookDetails
description:
Retrieve the full record of a specified webhook.

Use this tool to get complete details of a webhook by its ID. Requires webhooks:read scope.

parameters.name: webhook_global_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the webhook to retrieve its full record.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the webhook.

parameters.name: included_fields
parameters.description: List of optional properties to include in the response. Provide these as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enables pretty output formatting with line breaks and indentation. Use this for debugging, but be aware it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the webhook.
